thread.title: Fascinating landscape, ruins in Georgia — not that one

author: Ned Black
title: Fascinating landscape, ruins in Georgia — not that one
text:

Ned Black and Monica Milstein of Mill Valley in the Upper Svaneti...
Why I went: A National Geographic article on the horses, history and remoteness of this region, and the chapters on Georgia in John Steinbeck’s 1948 “A Russian Journal” intrigued us.
